mapper.select: SELECT u.id,u.loginname,u.status,u.name ,u.error_num,u.info,u.mobile, r.id as r_id,r.name as r_name,r.description as r_description,r.status as r_status,r.type as r_type FROM sys_user_account u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON (u.role_id = r.id) where u.loginname=#{loginname} and u.password=MD5(#{password})
SELECT id,name,url,level,parent,icon,remarks,seq FROM sys_menu order by seq
SELECT sm.* FROM sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on (sm.id = srm.menu_id) where srm.role_id=#{role_id} order by sm.seq;
